tool_description: Creates searchable index entries from processed genealogy documents with names, dates, locations, and cross-references for efficient research.

index_type.description: Index detail level: basic, standard, comprehensive

error_messages: Empty text input: Corrected text cannot be empty for indexing.
Invalid metadata format: Metadata must be valid JSON structure.
Missing document ID: Unique document identifier is required.
Index generation failed: Unable to process document content for indexing.
usage: Provide corrected_text and extracted_metadata with unique document_id, choose index_type based on detail needs, enable cross_reference for genealogical research connections.

index_entries.description: Generated index entries with search terms and references

name_index.description: Alphabetical name entries with document references

date_index.description: Chronological date entries with associated events

location_index.description: Geographic location entries with document links
